summary: Dr. Karaoulis is a geophysicist with over six years of work experience.  His expertise includes near surface geophysics, hydrogeophysics, and geology. His strong technical skills coupled with superb computing skills allow him to approach geophysical data in unconventional manner. He has developed numerous codes and algorithms for different applications including Gravity, Magnetics, Refraction, ElectroMagnetics, Self Potential, Electrical Resistivity Tomography, Induced Polarization. He also participated in numerous field investigations. In addition Dr. Karaoulis teaches courses in topics such as inversion theory, potential fields, programming.

profile_positions.description:
	Study on Negligible Dedicated Equipment on Rovers for Soil Testing and Appraisal of Navigable fields (UNDERSTAND). Project for the European Space Agency to risk assessment of the soil terrain, using rover built-in sensors.  
	Project leader for drone monitoring development. Arduino code to GPS, LiDAR, Electromagnetic Sensors and drone flight control. Data collections and analysis using python. 
	Kennisimpuls Nutrienten: Real-time detection and prediction of nitrate leaching and contamination of the water resources from farms. Design of experiment setup, hardware implementation, data collection and data analysis.
	WarmingUP: Accelerating the Dutch energy transition. The main goal of WarmingUP is the development of collective heating systems that are affordable, sustainable, reliable, practicable and socially acceptable. Design of lab test to validate the data collection, hardware implementation for data collections, data analysis.  Transform data to information for stakeholders.
	DigiTwin PPS: The DigiTwin project for Flood Defence and Subsurface aims to provide a 'framework' for the development of a Digital Twin for Flood Defences and Subsurface and the application of data fusion methods, using machine learning and AI. 
	Big data processing and visualization: Machine Learning on big data. Statistical analysis and developing of data framework using AI.  Developing python code to be used for in-house projects. Several projects. Machine learning paper under publication.
	IPI4DI: Matlab software development for 4D analysis of geophysics data (https://doi.org/10.1016/j.cageo.2013.01.008) 

Geophysical skills
•	Environmental and geotechnical applications
•	Fresh/salt water applications
•	Helicopter airborne electromagnetics (time and frequency domain)
•	Landbased geophysics
•	Marine geophysics
•	Geophysical monitoring
•	Electromagnetics,  Electrical Resistivity Tomography (ERT), Time Domain and Frequency domain EM,  Ground penetrating radar,  surface waves MASW
